item.title: The Washington Post is retreating from Silicon Valley when it matters most
item.description: The Bezos-owned newspaper gutted its San Francisco bureau and coverage of tech — including journalists reporting on Amazon and Blue Origin

item.title: A16z VC wants founders to stop stressing over insane ARR numbers
item.description: A16z VC Jennifer Li⁠, who oversees some of the firm's fastest growing AI companies, warns founders not to believe every ARR claim made on X.

item.title: OpenAI launches new agentic coding model only minutes after Anthropic drops its own
item.description: The new model is build to accelerate the capabilities of Codex, the agentic coding tool OpenAI launched earlier this week.

item.title: One of Europe’s largest universities knocked offline for days after cyberattack
item.description: An alleged ransomware attack has taken down the systems of the Sapienza University of Rome.

item.title: Elon Musk is getting serious about orbital data centers
item.description: We’re starting to see the idea of Musk-owned orbital AI data clusters cohere into an actual plan.
